custom.title: [Poem]
custom.prompt: Write a short poem about this: {{issueTitle}}

relatedIssues.title: [Related Issues]
relatedIssues.prompt: Find very similar related issue titles for " title: {{issueTitle}} "  from thies issues: {{openIssues}} . If none of them very similar just respond with a "none". Make a list of issue title what is may related in this format [title](link) - [the similarity]
